pages.text: $(li)The Smite enchantment can be applied in any kind of $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l).$(br)$(li)This enchantment increase the damage inflicted of undead creatures like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/zombie)Zombies$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/skeleton)Skeleton$(/l).
pages.title: Smite

pages.text: $(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level IV.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level V of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_smite)Ancient Tome (Smite)$(/l).
